summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 PONTIAC G5. WHILE DRIVING AT SPEEDS OF 55 MPH, THE POWER STEERING WOULD INTERMITTENTLY FAIL. THE VEHICLE WOULD BECOME INCREASINGLY DIFFICULT TO CONTROL. THE MANUFACTURER STATED THAT THERE WERE NO RECALLS AND WOULD PROVIDE NO ASSISTANCE. THERE WERE NO REPAIRS MADE TO THE VEHICLE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 72,000 AND THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 74,000.
